name: Eeksa
content: Eeksa was a female Ithorian who lived on the planet Torina during the reign of the Galactic Empire. She operated the pet shop Eeksa's Rare Exotics and Pets in the city Brindibarr and at some point during the early stages of the Galactic Civil War, she hired a team of Rebel Alliance agents to transport an albino farlek to the residence of the businessman Pelleo Thog, a collector of rare animals.
